nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592.model.history

Class Entry

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592.model.history.Entry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Entry>

    public class Entry
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Entry>
    This class contains the values for each complete sequential won games, including a current running game.
    Since:
    2015
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
